name: Volt
description: Volt is a rugged and battle-hardened oscilloscope-themed robot. Despite having a broken screen, Volt is a formidable member of the WebtrES club, utilizing its soldier-class arms and legs to navigate the digital landscape. With its classic box design and a cat-themed button interface, Volt combines nostalgia with cutting-edge technology. Despite its battle scars, Volt remains functional and ready to tackle any challenge that comes its way.
